settings.question: Do I need to be artistic?
settings.answer: Not at all. Our guide walks you through everything. Even beginners create amazing results.

settings.question: What's included in the paint kit?
settings.answer: 6-12 acrylic colors, brushes, palette, guide, and everything you need to complete your figurine.

settings.question: How long does painting take?
settings.answer: Most people finish in 2-3 hours. Take your time and enjoy the process—it's not a race!

settings.question: Can kids participate?
settings.answer: Yes! Ages 6+ can paint with supervision. Our paints are non-toxic and kid-safe.

settings.question: What if I mess up?
settings.answer: Acrylic paint is forgiving—just paint over mistakes. There's no "perfect" way to paint!

settings.question: How do I display the finished figurine?
settings.answer: Each order includes a display stand. Show it off on a shelf, desk, or anywhere you want!

settings.title: How Paint Your Own Works
settings.subtitle: From order to masterpiece in three simple steps
settings.step1_text:
Browse our collection of paint-ready figurines and choose your size. Every order includes a complete paint kit with brushes, paints, and step-by-step guide.

Solo project? Twin Set for two? Party Pack for groups? We have options for every occasion.
settings.step2_text: Your figurine is carefully packaged and shipped within 3-5 business days. Track your order from warehouse to your door.
settings.step3_text:
Set up anywhere—kitchen table, coffee table, backyard. Follow our guide or freestyle your own design. Most people finish in 2-3 hours.

There's no wrong way to paint. Every piece is unique.
